short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Utility extension that makes working with Composer Symphonies easier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides many small useful features in the composer.trade UI. 

As of right now here is a small list

  - Display quant stats for live symphonies in line on the portfolio page
  - Build Tearsheets in context for individual symphonies. Live, OOS, and full Backtest
  - Inline tooltips for describing tickers
  - CMD + click with ticker tooltip open to jump to yahoo finance ticker page
  - Adds logarithmic charting (ALT + L)
